  Thanks
  
Misty <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
          This is a public forum so the world has access to read our research. 
Posting privledges are just that...a privledge. And this member has 
been informed privately and in public of this groups purpose as well 
as been offered help by other members. He has a right to his beliefs, 
he just needs to find the correct forum to discuss them =)

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...> 
wrote:
>
> Misty, can you please remove Nathan's access to this site. I just 
spent the last several minutes deleting these e-mails that have 
nothing to do with our mission and research purposes of this site.
> 
> Not sure about the rest of the members, but this guy is 
interfering with our work and correspondence, and you have given him 
every chance to shape up and respect our wishes.
> 
> 
>

> PLEASE BE CAREFUL WITH THIS BOX EXPERIMENTATION, THERE IS 
A

>

AND
> THIS IS NOT COMING FROM ME, BUT FROM THE INVENTOR OF THE SPIRICOM 
> George W. Meek, HE STATES THAT TWO EXPERIMENTERS WITH THE SPIRICOM
> BECAME POSSESSED AND ONE COMMITTED SUICIDE. 
> 
> HE GAVE A PRAYER TO USE BEFORE STARTING TO EXPERIMENT. HERE IS A 
LINK

> 
> HERE IS THE LINK ABOUT THE DANGERS PLEASE READ AND FOLLOW THE

> > Hi guys !!!I hope Bruce does not mind me posting this.I had
> questions whether my RS is working or not,so, I consulted with
> Bruce.He asked me a few questions on my set up and to send a test
> session. So, I let the session run on its own and sent him the raw
> file.Well, sure enough, it is working just fine. I had some static 
and
> learned to move the radio around to a better spot.But amazingly one 
of
> the messages was " I want to see Bruce !"You can hear it clear as 
day.
> Also, I got some vulgar messages and I wonder about this. When 
Debbie
> did a session with me in the beginning she got some eye opening
> messages for me. One was "cut the bull ----". Debbie said that can't
> be !!! but it was right on !!! we were trying to contact my mom and
> that was one of her favorite sayings here !!! LOLHowever, the 
messages
> Bruce recovered in my session were a little more vulgar and not
> something from my mom.I also had events in the house after starting
> recording sessions.The RS box would go on by itself, not while I was
> home, and I live alone. This happened several times, the third time 
I
> came home my computerized clothes dryer locked it's control panel, 
the
> RS was on and my wireless router needed to be reset. I now need help
> with Audacity or sound booth. I don't know how to use it to clean 
the
> background noise up.Thanks again Bruce (I hope you don't mind my
> posting !!??)Holly
